page.content: tradition of processing agricultural products as does the local distillery. The biggest employer in Blackford is Highland Spring whose production line is the most advanced in Europe. The plant was set up to meet the growing demand for bottled spring water. The success in the venture is reflected in the production figures from 1984 to 1985 where production increased by 48%. A new pattern of employment within the village has been the establishment of Silicon Glen a computer repair and services company. Council and Health services, British Rail and local tradesmen provide the other main sources of employment.
